title: Development Rules
subtitle: Review criteria used by /memoria:review. Auto-extracted from sessions or added manually.

explanation.title: What are Rules?
explanation.devRules: Coding standards and architecture rules (e.g., avoid N+1 queries)
explanation.reviewGuidelines: Code review checklist items (e.g., verify transactions)
explanation.description: Rules discovered during sessions are automatically added. Use /memoria:review to check code against these rules.
